sentences.english: Yet Confucius may not hold on his works in every spring and autumn.

sentences.english: Chu verses, Han rhymes, all the brilliant poems converged into a chorus of praise for central Anhui;

sentences.english: Writing poems, calligraphy, painting and designing are his game and sustenance.

sentences.english: And now, he is the member of China Artists Association and the sole duty painter of Sichuan Poem and Calligraphy Hua Yuan.

sentences.english: All of them not only have different status but also different identity.
sentences.chinese: 詩書畫三絕者有之，地位不同，身份各異。
